section.title: Objective and Overview
section.para: Due to the web interface of mailing lists and forums it is difficult to know when an attachment is made in a post/thread without clicking on each post/thread. In order to alleviate the burden of searching through each post/thread, we have organized a listing of wiki pages that contain the files relevant to the respective discussion. If you don't see an attachment referred to in an email or post, add a comment to this page using the discussion link located above the page.

section.title: Reference Documents
section.para: The latest draft specification for GMAT. This document is not yet reviewed, and subject to frequent revision:
